item.title: Just add water
item.description: Just add water Yesterday was brew day and only second time I tried out the new setup. Turned out quite well I reckon. But wonâ€™t know for sure till 3-4 weeks from now. Pictures follow the process from, mash, sparge, boil, chill and into fermenter. #homebrew #craftbrewing #bulimbabrewing #greengarage
